form.name: [Inline] Challenge questions and answers
form.description: So that a tech can make sure that a verbal conversation is with the correct person

fields.name: Challenge Questions
fields.description: These are the questions our techs will ask you, to verify your identity, when talking over the phone

fields.name: What city were you born in?
fields.description: if its a town, rather than a city, that's ok too
